EmailTemplate.description: SEND THANK YOU EMAIL TO LEAD TO STOP BY WITH FSS - DO NOT DELETE -
EmailTemplate.name: _LEAD_THANKS_FOR_STOP_BY
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Appreciates Your Interest
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
On behalf of the Honeywell Business and General Aviation team we would like to thank you for visiting our booth during the 2013 NBAA Convention. It is our hope that your time there was informative and you were able to find aviation at its best in our displays. If you require additional information or clarification for inputs you received, please contact the undersigned and we will have a sales representative follow up to you promptly.
I hope that your attendance at this yearâ€™s show was beneficial and we look forward to servicing your needs at the next possible opportunity.
Best Regards,
